After a while, small bubbles appeared on the surface of the eggshells. The next day there were more bubbles. In a couple of days, the eggshells were gone and the liquid was clear. I think I made a solution and a reaction. Explain why Grace thinks she made a solution.". You should assess the student responses on the following scale: correct or incorrect. You can gain a better understanding of the task through the following reference responses. They are classified in the following 1 category(s):  BEST. BEST - what the optimal answer would look like:  Best_answer_1 - "A solution was created when the eggshells disappeared (dissolved) and the mixture ended up as a clear liquid., ". Based on these reference answers, could you grade the following 6 student responses.
